about_the_game:
Date Time❤️ is a Retro-Horror game set in an ALTERNATE 1980s where you’re tasked to play corrupted DATING SIMULATORS.

Each Dating Simulator pits you against a new DIGITAL MONSTER based on REAL COMPUTER VIRUSES. Explore your environment to uncover the dark secrets of each, make friends along the way… and survive long enough FOR A ❤️SMOOCH❤️.

The REMAKE and SEQUEL to the viral Melissa❤️ played by Marikplier, ManlyBadAssHero and more is here!



Date Time❤️ intermixes Exploration, Puzzle-Solving and Dating Sim elements into an old tech retro nightmare.

Explore your world both within the digital realm and outside of it to unearth a hidden mystery, delve into ungodly dimensions, and SMOOCH HORRORS beyond your imagination!


Each Monster, date or not… is based on a REAL COMPUTER VIRUS throughout computer history. Once you survive your encounter, you can unlock more information about the virus and the actual damage it caused in the real world. Each character's behaviors and personality is heavily based on their real counterparts!

As you progress through all the stories, you'll unlock more information about the viruses, and the mysterious company responsible for them.






Melissa❤️, she's a sweetheart of a girl! A smart woman into science and art! You may be surprised how DEEP her knowledge GOES!



Morris❤️, a pouty mechanic who is secretly into poetry. Get close enough, you may find out where his TRUE TASTES lie!



And... Anna❤️, an active athlete who strives to be the best in everything! Play your cards right, and nothing will ever get you SEPARATED!



More Features:
  • Date your way through 5 DIFFERENT STORIES, featuring new horrors connecting an overarching story.
  • Learn more about the COMPUTER VIRUSES behind each monster after surviving an encounter with them. UNLOCK ALL 8!
  • Your choices judge you... and the WORLD'S fate.
  • Celebrate the world of old tech by reliving Silicon Valley's rise through dot-matrix printers, one-button mice... and doing so much with 4KB of RAM.
  • Enjoy a FULLY-ANIMATED adventure. Every element in the game pulses with terrifying cinematic cutscenes.
  • Play your cards right, and you'll get a SMOOCH!


❤️They're all waiting for you!❤️

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Date Time❤️: Melissa❤️, Morris❤️, Anna❤️

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“WERE YOUR EYES JUST CLOSED?! DO YOU HAVE DARK EYE SHADOW OR SOMETHING?!”
Markiplier (on Melissa❤️)

“Wait... what was THAT?! WHAT WAS THAT?! DID YOU SEE HER FACE?!!!”
special edd (on Melissa❤️)

“Are her eyes closed or gone? CLOSED OR GONE?!”
LaurenZside (on Melissa❤️)
short_description: DATE, FLIRT & SURVIVE in this Retro-Horror Adventure where you date characters based on REAL Computer VIRUSES. Explore and uncover dark secrets behind each character and make choices that will lead to a ❤️SMOOCH❤️ or your DOOM!
